1165500.name: GameLab UngAalborg
1165500.description:
Welcome to GameLab UngAalborg's game launcher!
You will be able to try out all of our available games and prototypes made by people from the physical space of GameLab.
You'll be able to try games about removing plastic from the sea and upgrading your raft in "plastic planet" or killing zombies in "ZombVasion". You'll also be able to play the different versions of "Slap City" or shoot your way through the complex in the game "Rampage inc". The genres varies from top down controller games, to 2D sidescrollers - You'll probably find something to your liking!
1165500.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
